</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns if map was forced by using [[forceMap]] command or [[openMap]] command with force option </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''forcedMap''' </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - in format [forceMapForced, openMapForced] where:
* forceMapForced: [[Boolean]] - [[true]] if map was forced with [[forceMap]] command
* openMapForced: [[Boolean]] - [[true]] if map was forced with [[openMap]] command.
</value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_forceMapForced = [[forcedMap]] [[select]] 0;
_openMapForced = [[forcedMap]] [[select]] 1;</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
